    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Slippery Secrets](/Feats.aspx?ID=5215) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 262 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

You elude and evade attempts to uncover your true nature or intentions. When a spell or magical effect tries to read your mind, detect whether you are lying, or reveal your identity, you can attempt a Deception check against the spell or effect’s DC. If you succeed, the effect reveals nothing.
name: Slippery Secrets
